Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend

Interface Summary
BackEndLSP An interface representing the back end of the LSP; the wrapper onto the legacy collection.
 

Class Summary
BackEndLSPAdapter This slightly more concrete implementation of BackEndLSP includes storage and getter implementations for for the most basic, SDLIP-defined characteristics of the wrapped subcollection.
LSPDocSorter A convenient utility class for sorting LSPDocs using an array of LSPSortByFields.
QueryProcessor This abstract class should be used by back-end developers for processing queries, because it embodies the logic the STARTS specification follows.
StandardQueryProcessor This QueryProcessor implementation, while still abstract, is still a bit more concrete and is a good one to subclass.
 

Exception Summary
BackEndException A very simple exception class designed to notify classes in the sdarts.frontend that something has gone wrong in the sdarts.backend layer.
